requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7
  • Processor:2GHz Dual Core
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:NVIDIA GeForce 6800 or ATI Radeon x1950 or better with 256MB VRAM
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:9 GB HD space
  • Additional:Broadband Internet connection recommended for co-op play.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional:Broadband Internet connection recommended for co-op play.

requirements_ru.minimum: Core 2 Duo/Athlon x2 2 ГГц,2 Гб памяти,GeForce 6800/Radeon x1950,9 Гб на винчестере
requirements_ru.recommended: Сore i5/Phenom II 3 ГГц,3 Гб памяти,3D-ускоритель с 512 Мб памяти,9 Гб на винчестере
